pack: Legend of Blue Eyes White Dragon

cards.name: Aqua Madoor
cards.reviewText: Kinda hard. Great DEF for a no tribute monster and had at least some purpose as a wall. The mask is hard too

cards.name: Armaill
cards.reviewText: Reminds me of an early stage monster in RPGs u spam kill for EXP.

cards.name: Armed Ninja
cards.reviewText: Not bad for its time I guess (considering the alternatives) but who sets spell cards? This is cool because this is like a pioneer of Yugioh's ninja archetype tho

cards.name: Armored Starfish
cards.reviewText: ShrekLookingUp.gif

cards.name: Basic Insect
cards.reviewText: The literal embodiment of pack filler. It's even in the name.

cards.name: Beast Fangs
cards.reviewText: Yep there were a wholeeee bunch of these early equip spells with 300 ATK/DEF boosts for a specific type.

cards.name: Beaver Warrior
cards.reviewText: I genuinely think Konami was trolling with some of these card ideas. Mid stats I guess.

cards.name: Book of Secret Arts
cards.reviewText: Another of the 300 ATK/DEF equip spells.

cards.name: Celtic Guardian
cards.reviewText: One of Yugi's classic cards, and iconic artwork that I see cosplayed everywhere still. But still, mid stats.

cards.name: Charubin the Fire Knight
cards.reviewText: One of the trash early Yugioh fusions lol. Deserves a 0

cards.name: Curse of Dragon
cards.reviewText: Another of Yugi's iconic monsters that fuse for Gaia the Dragon Champion. Even though it's trash on its own.

cards.name: Dark Energy
cards.reviewText: Drink water today guys

cards.name: Dark Gray
cards.reviewText: A generic goat with tiny wings (what even is the purpose?). Get ready to see a lot more of these.

cards.name: Dark Hole
cards.reviewText: Yessir. Now we are talking. This was a universal staple and broke the game in the early years. It's hovered between the banned and limited list for years and years, and for good reason.

cards.name: Dark King of the Abyss
cards.reviewText: King of the Netherworld that paints his nails lol. Not that there's anything wrong with that. Shoutout Caleb Williams the BUST. I'm so mad at week 1 man.

cards.name: Darkfire Dragon
cards.reviewText: Make sure you get good sleep too. I got like 3 hours last night and my head's ringing.

cards.name: Darkworld Thorns
cards.reviewText: Is it eating something or being freaky with the tongue?

cards.name: Dissolverock
cards.reviewText: Jabba the Hutt?

cards.name: Dragon Capture Jar
cards.reviewText: One of the earliest 'floodgates' in Yugioh. When BEWD was considered a tier 0 card, this provided a sort of a counter.

cards.name: Dragon Treasure
cards.reviewText: I always thought that treaasure on the dragon looked like the dirty bubble from Spongebob lol

cards.name: Dragoness the Wicked Knight
cards.reviewText: How do those fusion materials fuse to make this woman

cards.name: Drooling Lizard
cards.reviewText: Ew

cards.name: Electro-Whip
cards.reviewText: Follow the Drinking Gourd

cards.name: Enchanting Mermaid
cards.reviewText: She kinda bad but she sucks

cards.name: Exodia the Forbidden One
cards.reviewText: Yessir. Now we're back to iconicness. Gave rise to terribly annoying stall decks while the 5 pieces were collected.

cards.name: Fiend Reflection #2
cards.reviewText: Bro I got such a dirty mind lol

cards.name: Final Flame
cards.reviewText: Goddamn boi. Straight cruxificion and burning at the stake??? No CHANCE this flies today.

cards.name: Firegrass
cards.reviewText: I wonder if PvZ got the peashooter design from here. Surely right?

cards.name: Fireyarou
cards.reviewText: Generic One Piece character

cards.name: Fissure
cards.reviewText: Destroying an opponent's monster is always solid, especially during this time period.

cards.name: Flame Ghost
cards.reviewText: Ugh. I got a headache.

cards.name: Flame Manipulator
cards.reviewText: How's y'all day going? Drink some water.

cards.name: Flame Swordsman
cards.reviewText: One of the classic Joey Wheeler fusions when he sucked. It's also one of the many 'not worth it' fusions of early yugioh.

cards.name: Flower Wolf
cards.reviewText: Ok this one's funny

cards.name: Follow Wind
cards.reviewText: What if I don't?

cards.name: Forest
cards.reviewText: Looks like a forest.

cards.name: Frenzied Panda
cards.reviewText: Now that I think of it, I've never seen an angry panda. They're always just goofing around and falling from trees.

cards.name: Fusionist
cards.reviewText: Probably the worst fusion monster in the game's history. When Elder Entity Norden was unbanned though, this was the common choice for Instant Fusion, so it does have significance.

cards.name: Gaia the Dragon Champion
cards.reviewText: A knight on a dragon. Classic Arthurian stuff. Yugi fused this guy in the anime. Decent ATK. That's about it.

cards.name: Giant Soldier of Stone
cards.reviewText: Pretty solid wall card with 2000 DEF. Yugi also used him to destroy the moon. Idk man early Yugioh was just full of random shit lol

cards.name: Goblin's Secret Remedy
cards.reviewText: Herbs and pills. Wow.

cards.name: Gravedigger Ghoul
cards.reviewText: Pretty solid actually. Banishing (removing from play) was not handled AT ALL in early Yugioh so this effectively removed monsters from the game.

cards.name: Green Phantom King
cards.reviewText: This guy looks like someone. I can't figure out who though.

cards.name: Hane-Hane
cards.reviewText: Not bad

cards.name: Hinotama Soul
cards.reviewText: I wonder if PvZ got the peashooter design from here. Surely right?

cards.name: Hitotsu-Me Giant
cards.reviewText: This card is special to me- I got him in a McDonald's toy when I was like 8. But, alas, still dogwater, even for the time.

cards.name: Left Arm of the Forbidden One
Left Leg of the Forbidden One
Mammoth Graveyard
cards.reviewText: I think Kaiba fused this with Blue Eyes Ultimate Dragon in the anime which was kinda cool. If not for that this gets a 1.

cards.name: Monster Egg
cards.reviewText: Flinging eggshells LMAO

cards.name: Nemuriko
cards.reviewText: Nemuriko means sleeping child in Japanese. That's becoming me giving reviews for these pathetic cards.

cards.name: Petit Angel
cards.reviewText: Flinging eggshells LMAO

cards.name: Petit Dragon
cards.reviewText: ZZZZ.

cards.name: Right Arm of the Forbidden One
Right Leg of the Forbidden One
Silver Fang
cards.reviewText: A generic wolf. More pack filler.

cards.name: The 13th Grave
cards.reviewText: More filler.

cards.name: Tri-Horned Dragon
cards.reviewText: Not bad I guess, but it's just an objectively worse Blue-Eyes by 150 ATK/DEF each. Also looks ugly as hell.

cards.name: Trial of Nightmare
cards.reviewText: Damn. Kind of metal. Early Yugioh went crazy with the occult horror stuff, which I love. But other than that it's got mid stats.

cards.name: Turtle Tiger
cards.reviewText: Ok what is this lol. Now they're just making shit up.
